CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To investigate the photovoltaic properties of the NDT - based semiconductor , PSC devices with a configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / Ca / Al were fabricated.

Let's think step by step.

1. NDT-based semiconductor: This is a material or type of semiconductor, but the specific name is not mentioned.
2. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
3. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate)
4. Polymer: This is a type of material, but the specific name is not mentioned.
5. PC71BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. Ca: Calcium
7. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. NDT-based semiconductor (if a specific name is mentioned, include that)
2. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
3. PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate))
4. Polymer (if a specific name is mentioned, include that)
5. PC71BM (Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. Calcium
7. Aluminum.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To investigate the photovoltaic properties of the NDT - based semiconductor , PSC devices with a configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / Ca / Al were fabricated.

Let's think step by step.

1. NDT-based semiconductor
2. PSC devices
3. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
4. PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate))
5. Polymer : PC71BM (Poly[2,6-(4,4-bis(2-ethylhexyl)-4H-cyclopentadithiophene-2,6-diyl):3,6-bis(3-hexylthiophene-2-yl)benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']dithiophene-4,8-dioxole)
6. Ca (Calcium)
7. Al (Aluminum)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. NDT-based semiconductor (implies photovoltaic properties)
2. ITO (work function, optical transparency)
3. PEDOT : PSS (conductivity, optical transparency)
4. Polymer : PC71BM (optical properties, electrical conductivity)
5. Ca (none)
6. Al (work function, reflectivity)

So, the relevant Property Value entities are:

1. NDT-based semiconductor (photovoltaic properties)
2. ITO (work function, optical transparency)
3. PEDOT : PSS (conductivity, optical transparency)
4. Polymer : PC71BM (optical properties, electrical conductivity)
5. Al (work function)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| NDT-based semiconductor (photovoltaic properties) |
| ITO (work function, optical transparency) |
| PEDOT : PSS (conductivity, optical transparency) |
| Polymer : PC71BM (optical properties, electrical conductivity) |
| Al (work function) |
